title: Justaboredrandomguy
author: Justaboredrandomguy
content: I need to buy a HUGE amount of Bitcoins for a company, about 500+ bitcoins; so I prefer dealing with a company too or a TRUSTED INDIVIDUAL with this amount. We prefer Cash trade ... so we have to meet. Bank deposit is also a choice and your company account must be able to hold huge amounts! Location is Manila Philippines.  Trade will be done via Localbitcoins Escrow or another Trusted Escrow. Please anyone interested in this trade drop me a PM with your direct contacts too. Its urgent!Regards.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: I'm curious, why are you mentioning escrow when you're buying from Local Bitcoin? As far as I know, Local Bitcoin is a peer-to-peer exchange that escrows funds. So you can buy directly from there. Binance, on the other hand, is an option. It's recently become the most popular peer-to-peer exchange because it's fast and reliable. If you are serious about purchasing, choose the most secure option. Don't put your money in the hands of anyone online. By the way, don't put your money in any exchange. Keep your money in a hardware wallet.
